column5: Another awesome day on the Lake ..todays fish came from SW of Port Maitland 69 to 72 fow ...Big Dipsys 175 back on a 2 setting with Gold Willows ..Small Dipsys back 175 on a 0 setting was hot Water Melon and Blue Berry round blades ...if your out and need to find fish give me a call on 68 vhf ..  Caught this also only took me 25 min to crank it in 275 ft lol...  Ended the day going 17 for 22 Walleye fishing off Port Maitland is on Fire get out and enjoy ...
Geez....didn't know the green stuff grew that big    Great report and pics!  Thanks for sharing! Leechman
The guy on the right in the first pic is the reason they invented clothing!
Great report Steve...  Man you guys are on to them off Maitland this year  Cheers  Craig
good report, there sure are some nice walleye you are pulling out this year  cheers!

Very nice day for sure...Tried for walleye yesterday in a little lake around my home and not a thing...Did anyone else notice on the stringer line that one was not a walleye...Must have been a little perch snack craving.
Looks like a great trip however the guy smoking in the proximity of the young fisherman should know better
While I agree smoking around kids is bad they are outside on a moving boat, try walking in any city and breathing in the car fumes among other pollutants, tell me which is worse for the young boy.
Sorry but I see no justification at any level. But I am glad to see the young fishermanâ€™s pride with his catch.
I wish I had those waldos in my frying pan right now.  Great job guys.  Great report.
Well I hope you don't drive or own a boat, you are doing far more damage to his lungs and the environment than smoking in an open space.
